law.text: KRS 15.530 to 15.590 shall be administered by the Kentucky Law Enforcement Council, which shall promulgate administrative regulations as necessary regarding training, in-service training, and telecommunications practices.
law.history: Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 82, sec. 7, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 480, sec. 10, effective July 14, 2000. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 315, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1986.
